creditline: Lent by the Wang Xing Lou Collection
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: small wine cup; porcelain; ruby ground with intertwining vines and open flowers of orange/yellow and blue
marks:
Marks; Stickers

Inside at bottom: round sticker
medium:
Falangcai ware
Porcelain with overglaze famille-rose enamel decoration
text: This jewel-like wine cup has been decorated with brilliant <I>falangcai<I> enamels. The imperial mark on the bottom, however, suggests it was made and painted at Jingdezhen with locally produced <I>falangcai<I> enamels, rather than at the workshops inside the Forbidden City in Beijing.
title: Wine Cup with Flower-scroll Design
